---
title: Extract Frames Sync
full: true
_openapi:
  method: POST
  route: /extract/frames/sync
  toc: []
  structuredData:
    headings: []
    contents:
      - content: |-
          Synchronous frame extraction for workers and direct use.
          Returns the extracted frames immediately.
          For sections: returns SectionFrameExtractionResult with frames list
          For documents: returns FrameExtractionResult with root_frame

{/* This file was generated by Fumadocs. Do not edit this file directly. Any changes should be made by running the generation command again. */}

Synchronous frame extraction for workers and direct use.
Returns the extracted frames immediately.
For sections: returns SectionFrameExtractionResult with frames list
For documents: returns FrameExtractionResult with root_frame

<APIPage document={"http://localhost:8000/openapi.json"} operations={[{"path":"/extract/frames/sync","method":"post"}]} webhooks={[]} hasHead={false} />
